=System=

{{{
System,<Action>
}}} 

This command is used to perform some program internal actions and refresh values that were modified during the script execution. 
It can also set a flag that reminds the program to perform the specified action once the project is completed. `<Action>` can have of the following values

   * [systemComp80 System,Comp80]
   * [systemCursor System,Cursor]
   * [systemErrorOff System,ErrorOff]
   * [systemFileRedirect System,FileRedirect]  ^64bit systems only^
   * [systemGetEnv System,GetEnv]
   * [systemGetFreeDrive System,GetFreeDrive]
   * [systemGetFreeSpace System,GetFreeSpace]
   * [systemHasUAC System,HasUAC]
   * [systemIsAdmin System,IsAdmin]
   * [systemIsTerminal System,IsTerminal]
   * [systemLog System,Log]
   * [systemOnBuildExit System,OnBuildExit]
   * [systemOnScriptExit System,OnScriptExit]
   * [systemRebuildVars System,RebuildVars]
   * [systemRefreshInterface System,RefreshInterface] 
   * [systemRefreshVars System,RefreshVars] 
   * [systemRegRedirect System,RegRedirect] ^64bit systems only^
   * [systemReScanScripts System,ReScanScripts]
   * [systemSaveLog System,SaveLog]
   * [systemSplitParameters System,SplitParameters]
